description: Proxmox Host IPMI Dashboard using the Telegraf IPMI plugin

targets.query:
from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ipmi_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["server"] == "${serveripmi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "cpu_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "degrees_c")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"CPU Temp"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "anarion")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ipmi_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["server"] == "${serveripmi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "system_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "degrees_c")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"System Temp"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

title: Proxmox pve2  - Hosts IPMI
